resources.string: Modified Apps made by PDesire, themed like Project Desire. Works only on Sony Xperia devices with Stock LP ROM
Does make the Soundstage wider with newest DTS Surround Sound Technology, made by DTS Engineers and performed by PDesire
Enable/Disable the old Trebble definition from Project Yume One
Boosts Definition of the Sound via Oversampling
Includes Special Features on Bluetooth Audio made by SRS and configured by PDesire
Includes Special Features for Headphones made by SRS and configured by PDesire
Includes Special Features on Speaker and Earpiece made by SRS and configured by PDesire
SRS Audio on Speaker and Earpiece
Boosts Volume higher on Headphones and Speaker
Enables Project Hatsune, to totally enhance the sound output of external speakers
Enhance the output of Subwoofer with clearer and punchy bass
Balance the subwoofer and the other speaker to fusion them to one monumental sound experience
Simulates Subwoofer on non-subwoofer Sound Systems
Boosts Speaker to hear every vocal and every vibe like you have headphones
Project Hatsune is the first mod for external speaker systems, which enhance the sound to the maximum of abilities
Project Hatsune is very experimental and not all features could work to 100%, I am not responsible for any crashes and bricks

App Teacher: Abo Hani 
 
Inspiration: Kagamine Rin, Megpoid Gumi, Utsu-P, Megurine Luka, Hatsune Miku, Sony Corp. and Google Inc.
 
Mentor: Honaka Rie (jimRnor) 
 
And to: 
 
Team Project Desire, Team Harmonics Symphonium, RXS Moonbreakers, TPD Developer Promotion Project Group and XTREMEMusic Big Family Group
You have to grant ROOT permissions if SuperSU ask you for it that all works fine :) \n \nAfter you finished to set your perfect settings, Reboot your device to let the changes work :)
You have not Project Meli installed, without installed Project Meli this app do not work \n \nPlease the Project Meli Thread on XDA Developers to get the mod
